name: Fury On The Road
description:
Bang! Bang! Bang! Die blood bag!

Be the fury on the road! you’ll weave through the arena, rocket down dangerous  canyons at breakneck speeds, all the while evading a relentless thugs trying to take you down.

This is a game made in 72 hours for Movie Game Jam. This is game inspired by Mad Max: Fury Road.

Drive your car with WASD while use your MOUSE seek and destroy your enemy  

You can charge them with the front of your car and split them into pieces!

 You only can repair you if you destroy them!

Do a Killstreaks and be the best! 


  • Juan Francisco Mora Palomino - @JfranMora - [Programming / Game Design / Audio / UX]
  • Sergio Font Gomez - @Bardolimo [2D Art / 3D Art / Game Design / Level Design]
